nodes.text: The Relacite crystal mines was used by the Galactic Republic on the Eastern Ice Shelf of the planet Ilum to process the Relacite variety of the Adegan crystal. During the time of the Battle of Ilum in the Galactic War the mines were raided by forces of the reconstituted Sith Empire.
The Relacite crystal mines appear as an area on Ilum in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
